Waltham.Sanderson\u2013Clark Farmhouse: The Sanderson–Clark Farmhouse is a historic farmstead at 47 Lincoln Street (aka 26 Lincoln Terrace) in Waltham, Massachusetts. The property includes an 1831 Federal style house, along with farm-related outbuildings, including a barn and stable. The property was used as a working farm until the early 20th century.
